code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const isFormValid=username.trim()!==''&&password.trim()!=='';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"login-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/",className:"nav-link",children:"\u2190 BACK"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/signup",className:"nav-link",children:"SIGN UP"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Log into CyberHome"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-form",onSubmit:e=>e.preventDefault(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",className:"form-label",children:"USERNAME"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",className:"form-input",placeholder:"Enter your username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",className:"form-label",children:"PASSWORD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"password-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",className:"form-input",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:`login-button ${isFormValid?'active':''}`,disabled:!isFormValid,children:"LOG IN"})]})]})]});};export default Login;
